pullrequest.title: Add job template deletion to cluster/common.py and cluster/__init__.py

content.raw:
It indeed seems to fix the memory leak found in issue 60: 

Graph of resident set size (kB) vs Time (2s timesteps) over 19 hours, with job template deletion:

![image.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/a7MnLo/images/870538536-image.png)

Graph of resident set size (kB) vs Time (2s timesteps) over just 2.5 hours, without job template deletion:

![imagecontrol.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/a7MnLo/images/3718677290-imagecontrol.png)
